thread.title: MicroStrategy Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call for Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results
thread.title_full: MicroStrategy Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call for Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results

author: admin
title: MicroStrategy Announces Earnings Release Date and Conference Call for Third Quarter 2015 Financial Results
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/19/2015 @ 1:01 PM Companies mentioned in this article: MicroStrategy Incorporated 
TYSONS CORNER, Va., Oct. 19, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- MicroStrategy (Â®) Incorporated (Nasdaq: MSTR), a leading worldwide provider of enterprise software platforms, today announced it will report its financial results for the third quarter of 2015 after the U.S. financial markets close on Monday, October 26, 2015. 
http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnvar/20140226/CL73058LOGO 
MicroStrategy will host a conference call on Monday, October 26, 2015 at 6:00 p.m. Eastern Daylight Time to discuss the company's third quarter 2015 financial results. To access this conference call, dial (844) 824-7425 (domestic) or (716) 220-9429 (international) and use conference ID 57551320. The conference call will also be webcast live and be available under the "Events & Presentations" section on MicroStrategy's investor relations website at http://ir.microstrategy.com/events.cfm . 
Following the conference call, a replay will be available beginning approximately two hours after the call concludes until October 31, 2015 at (855) 859-2056 (domestic) or (404) 537-3406 (international) using the replay pass code 57551320. An archived webcast of this conference call will also be available under the "Events & Presentations" section on MicroStrategy's investor relations website at http://ir.microstrategy.com/events.cfm . 
About MicroStrategy Incorporated Founded in 1989, MicroStrategy (Nasdaq: MSTR) is a leading worldwide provider of enterprise software platforms. The Company's mission is to provide enterprise analytics, mobility, and security platforms that are flexible, powerful, scalable, and user-friendly. To learn more, visit MicroStrategy online, and follow us on Facebook and Twitter . 
MicroStrategy is either a trademark or registered trademark of MicroStrategy Incorporated in the United States and certain other countries. Other product and company names mentioned herein may be the trademarks of their respective owners. 
MSTR-F
